definitions: in a way that lacks intelligence or common sense

examples.text: I admit that I have acted stupidly
we'd stupidly forgotten to book a cab

shortDefinitions: in way that lacks intelligence or common sense

definitions: in a dazed manner suggesting the inability to think clearly

examples.text: his eyes were vacant and he smiled stupidly

shortDefinitions: in dazed manner suggesting inability to think clearly

definitions: so as to cause surprise or disbelief; ridiculously

examples.text: one of the most stupidly danceable albums of the year

shortDefinitions: so as to cause surprise or disbelief
